title: hymperion
author: hymperion
content: Hello everyone, since I've been using the Nicehash pool the s9s give me several errors. With SHA256 asicboost I often get the error:QuoteWarning message: Network problem (or fan fault). Click for detailsToday I selected the SHA256 pool, without asicboost, and after a few minutes these 2 errors often appear:QuoteWarning message: Network problem (or fan fault). Click for detailsWarning message: Total hashrate 11250.51 is less than 90 percents of 13714.99, stopping minerwith other pools (like binance) it never happened to me.Did I do something wrong or are there some parameters to modify to avoid errors? I use hiveos.thanks

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Nicehash is not a good pool same goes to Binance pool if I were you switch to better pool like ViaBTC pool or kano.is pool.You can also find more pool under this link below- https://miningpoolstats.stream/bitcoin

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: Nicehash is the one that is now paying the most, with the same hashrate you get about 20% more.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: hymperion on April 21, 2023, 04:48:03 PMNicehash is the one that is now paying the most, with the same hashrate you get about 20% more.What do you focus on? The 20% reward that you get from Nicehash or to fix the error/issue that your miner currently has?It's your choice but I'd also like you to check more potential earnings on merged mining from ViaBTC you mine BTC then gets rewarded some free altcoins.Check this https://support.viabtc.com/hc/en-us/articles/900001530543-What-is-Merged-Mining-

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: I am certainly interested in solving the problem. I honestly thought it was a matter of settings, not pool problems, I didn't think NH was so bad as a pool. Now I get to the payout and change it.Merged mining with BTC is useless, fractions of very small dead coins do not affect earnings.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Yeah you should try with some other pool  and check if the issue is solved or not.You can just point it on solo ckpool for a while, and see if it's ok in your logs. If Nicehash is the problem and you really want to use their pool, you could try with an alternative firmware. Be very carreful and double check before using any firmware, some are very shady. If I am not wrong all firmwares are not NH compatible, you will have to double check before.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: hymperion on April 21, 2023, 10:15:10 AMHello everyone, since I've been using the Nicehash pool the s9s give me several errors. With SHA256 asicboost I often get the error:QuoteWarning message: Network problem (or fan fault). Click for detailsI disagree with the comment above, whether NH is good or bad has nothing to do with the current issue you are facing, and it will most likely occur on every other pool you use, let's clear some things.1- Which firmware are you using? the error you posted is surely not the stock firmware, not Vnish and very unlikely to be BO 2- Are you using stock fans?

comments.author: hymperion
comments.body: i use hiveos  1.02@191120on one asic i use the stock fans on the other i use 6000rpm. They give me the same error.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: hymperion on April 24, 2023, 06:29:19 AMi use hiveos  1.02@191120on one asic i use the stock fans on the other i use 6000rpm. They give me the same error.I would start by flashing the default firmware back, take the 2017 version or any other version that doesn't have a signature lock so that you won't need to SDcard it later on when you want to change, after doing so, post the kernel log from the stock firmware -- that should be a lot more detailed and a lot better to understand than this hiveos junk.

comments.author: lajmonline
comments.body: What is the income of investing in Bitcoin mining now?

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: lajmonline on July 08, 2023, 04:33:49 PMWhat is the income of investing in Bitcoin mining now?what is your power cost per kwatt?you need to know that answer to determine profit.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: lajmonline on July 08, 2023, 04:33:49 PMWhat is the income of investing in Bitcoin mining now?It's all depends on the power rate I suggest use some tools to calculate your profit with the current difficulty, power rate and hardware cost.Check this https://www.mycryptobuddy.com/BitcoinMiningCalculatorOr use https://www.asicminervalue.com/Just make sure to edit the electricity cost on the top.
